snippet.title: Alchemist Adventure Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Alchemist Adventure is an action-RPG that tells the story of Mya, a powerful alchemist who travels across the dangerous lands of mythical Isur trying to recall the lost memories of her past. 

Alchemist Adventure takes place in Isur, the mystical land of brilliant, yet dangerous alchemists, that now lies abandoned and ruined. You play as Mya, an alchemist who has awoken to find herself in an unknown place, confused and with no memories of what has happened. As she explores this enigmatic land, she will use the four elements — fire, water, air, and earth — to boost her abilities, transform the land around her, and solve alchemy-related puzzles.
